name: Vulcan Forged
public_notice: Vulcan Forged has been redeployed on Ethereum and Polygon. Find out more in their official announcement.

description.en: Vulcan Forged is a non-fungible token (NFT) game studio, marketplace and dApp incubator with multiple games and an active community of users.
